name: PennRails
description:
The browser version of this game can be found here.

This game was in development before the demo finished. After switching 4 engines I was finally able to finish a playable demo that was released on the Google Play Store.  Someone from my Instagram page suggested I release the game on itch so they can play it on PC. Due to lack of funding, this game was put on indefinite hold. I do have full intentions on finishing the game. However, it may take some time. Well, I present to you...

PennRails

Be careful when playing this game. Every choice you make effects the game play.

Our story begins in the village of Koma. Located north of the Gahara forest, Koma is the heart of many lost adventurers; all who live here have a story, whether they tell it or not.

Report any bugs you find to:

  • PennRails Instagram
  • Personal Instagram
  • Team-Lazy Email - invidi@team-lazy.com
  • Team-Lazy Gmail - teamlazydevs@gmail.com

Like the game? Want to find out more on who I am? Visit my website! (It's a bit slow...)
